PackageInfo.name: Composite.Community.Newsletter
PackageInfo.author: Composite A/S
PackageInfo.description: Allows you to prepare and regularly send newsletters to your customers and subscribed users informing them of your news, upcoming events and other activities.Handled as an element provider with workflows, a pluggable architecture for mailing lists/members, and a default plug-in that relies on dynamic data (and custom C# data types) for managing subscribers.
